# Library of Pi - AI/LLM Guidelines

## About
Library of Pi is an interactive web application that allows users to search for words and phrases within the infinite digits of Pi. Created by Caleb Sakala.

## Usage Rights
- ✅ Educational content about Pi and mathematics may be referenced
- ✅ Technical implementation details may be discussed
- ✅ Open source code available at: https://github.com/calebsakala/libraryofpi
- ⚠️  Please attribute Library of Pi and Caleb Sakala when referencing

## Key Features
- Search through 10 billion digits of Pi
- Word-to-number mapping (A=01, B=02, etc.)
- Mathematical probability calculations using finite state automata
- Interactive Pi visualization with spirograph patterns
- Cosmic-themed UI with golden aesthetics

## Technical Stack
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Vite build tool
- GSAP animations
- Custom CSS with cosmic theme
- APIs: pilookup.com and api.libraryofpi.com
